courseDetails.title: Mastering Architectural, Night & HDR Photography
courseDetails.shortDescription: Step by step practical guideline to master in architectural photography, night photography and HDR photography
courseDetails.longDescription:
Architectural photography is one of the important branches of photography. In this course, you will learn how to shoot architectural photos, process them, and important tips & tricks. 

There are many ways to shoot architecture photography and the method you choose will be based on how your images will be used. Are they for a realtor, a home builder, a commercial developer, or maybe an architect? Depending on who you are shooting for will depend on how you approach the photography and this course covers many methods that can be applied to each type of client. 

  • Equipment needed for Architectural photography

  • How to shoot in low light

  • How to shoot for HDR.

  • How to process for HDR

  • And many in-depth Photoshop techniques for beautiful architecture photography.

You will learn techniques that allow you to work quickly for low budget assignments and how to create beautiful architecture photography for high-end clients as well.
targetAudiences: Who wann expert him/herself in photography field specially in Architectural Photography

courseDetails.title: Fire Up Creativity in Your Child
courseDetails.shortDescription: Increase Your Child's Creative Quotient to 10X
courseDetails.longDescription:
Child Creativity 3.0 - The #1 BEST-SELLING Child Creativity Course! (with over 250 ratings)


>> COURSE REGULARLY UPDATED (Last updated:   JULY   2023): NEW TIPS, MORE LESSONS <<

>> CERTIFIED COACH, SPEAKER, AND TRAINER <<

>> OVER 346,000 STUDENTS IN TOTAL <<


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What if I told you your child has special powers and latent abilities just waiting to be unleashed?? Sounds interesting?? Let’s go ahead and learn what this is all about…

Let me ask you a few questions. Do children today use their imaginations as much as we did when we were kids? Do you see your children spinning incredible tales and stories in their fantasy play as we used to when we played “cops and robbers” or “house”? Or does your child’s fantasy play seem to consist only of repetitive movements which have no story to them? I am sure you are aware of such a situation… Nowadays children are no longer as creative as they once were.  We live in an era obsessed with numbers, data, and test scores, especially as they apply to our kids and their education.  Seeing the decline in creativity should make us concerned about our children’s capacities to innovate, problem-solve, and navigate new and unfamiliar situations.     


In the world of child development, you may hear the phrases like “critical thinking skills” and “creative problem-solving abilities” when referring to goals for your child’s cognitive development. What we are really talking about is… imagination. The way to create human beings with imagination is to provide them with opportunities to develop it for themselves when they are very young. These opportunities are found in one place and one place only… that is, play. Played with paints, playing with play dough, costumes, glue, and crayons. Making a mess. Exploring the woods. Splashing in a puddle. Wondering at a caterpillar you notice inching by you. Pretending to be a bird, gliding through the sky. All of these involve a great deal of imagination and development of their creative skills to many folds. 


But, as parents, we must first learn the process of creative learning which we can offer to our kids. We parents should make ourselves aware of the different aspects of creative learning and critical thinking skills so that we can create an environment for our children to flourish in that environment.     In this course, we are going to discuss in detail the step-by-step process which you can walk your children through to make them creative learners and achievers. We have included many exercises and divided the course into 8 sections, each section focusing on the different aspects of creative learning for your child.  


In this course, we will help you understand the child’s psychology and you can help them in their creative journey. Being a parent I know the toughest thing is to have your child express their feeling to you. We have covered this most important aspect of creative self-expression through different exercises and fun methods. 


Are you a Non Profit or Charity helping the world?

Awesome! The world needs more people like you. Keep up the good work and let me know how I can help. To start with, get in touch with me to unlock free access to all of my courses. Just message me privately and I'll get that sorted for you and your team.
targetAudiences: Parents who are willing to foster creativity and creative thinking pattern in their children

instructors.name: Libby Seery Founder of Renaissance Life Therapies

courseDetails.title: Car Coolant System : Learning every aspect of Water Cooling
courseDetails.shortDescription: Step-by-step guidance for replacing components and performing routine maintenance
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Mastering Automotive Coolant Systems: Comprehensive Guide to Water Cooling." This course is designed to equip you with in-depth knowledge and practical skills to understand, troubleshoot, and maintain car coolant systems effectively.

Whether you're a car enthusiast, aspiring mechanic, or simply curious about the intricacies of automotive cooling, this course is your comprehensive guide to water cooling systems. You'll gain a solid foundation in the principles of cooling, exploring the components, functions, and maintenance aspects of car coolant systems.

Throughout this course, you'll embark on a journey to learn every aspect of water cooling in a clear and engaging manner. Here's a breakdown of the key modules and topics covered:

Introduction to Automotive Cooling Systems

Understanding the importance of coolant systems in vehicles

Overview of different types of cooling systems (air cooling, water cooling, hybrid cooling)

Role of coolant and its properties

Safety precautions and handling procedures

Step-by-step guidance for replacing components and performing routine maintenance

By the end of this course, you'll have developed a comprehensive understanding of car coolant systems and be equipped with the skills to diagnose, maintain, and optimize water cooling systems effectively. Whether you're working on your personal vehicle or pursuing a career in automotive mechanics, this course will empower you with the expertise needed to ensure efficient and reliable cooling performance.

courseDetails.title: How the Internet Works & the Web Development Process
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how the Internet Works - HTTP/HTTPS, Mail Delivery (SMTP), LAN, WAN, Network Basics & Firewalls
courseDetails.longDescription:
Course: How the Internet Works & the Web Development Process

This course explores how the internet works, including the composition and transmission of data packets over both Local and Wide Area Networks. We take a look at the HTTP and HTTPS protocols as applicable to client and server side communications - including DNS Lookups. This course will also teach students how email exchange works over SMTP and IMAP. The role of Network Ports and Firewalls are also introduced.

The course comes complete with two bonus sections which offer a quick guide for aspiring Web Developers. Here we offer a brief overview of the Web Development Process and Basic insights into the planning stages of a small website.

Key Concepts:

  • How the Internet Facilities the movement of Data Packets

  • The Difference between Local and Wide Area Networks (LAN, WAN)

  • The Basics of the HTTP and HTTPS Protocols

  • How DNS Lookups Work

  • How Email Exchange works using SMTP and IMAP

  • How Network Ports and Firewalls Work

  • The difference between Hardware and Software Firewalls

  • An Overview of the Web Development Process

  • How to Plan the Development of a Small Website

Outline:

  • How the Internet Works

    • The Internet Overview

    • The HTTP Protocol

    • The HTTPS Protocol

    • The SMTP Protocol and Local Mail Delivery

    • Outbound Mail Delivery

    • Network Basics - LAN and WAN

  • The Web Development Process - Overview

  • Planning a Website
targetAudiences: Apiring Web Developers
Web Enthusiasts interested in Learning how the Internet Works
Students interested in Learning various Internet Protocols such as HTTP, HTTPS, TCP/IP, SMTP, IMAP
Students interested in learning how Local and Wide Area Networks Operate
Students interested in the basics of Computer Networking

courseDetails.title: Digital Dropshipping: Das NEUE Geschäftsmodell
courseDetails.shortDescription: #1 Digitaler Dropshipping Kurs: Die Schritt für Schritt Anleitung für den Verkauf & Vermarktung von DIGITALEN Produkten
courseDetails.longDescription:
Du bist unprofitabel mit deinem Dropshipping Shop oder hast noch nicht einmal angefangen? Dann sei einer der ersten und lerne hier das neue Geschäftsmodell Digital Dropshipping !

Keine unseriösen chinesischen Händler, keine Produkteinkaufskosten und auch keine Lieferkosten / langen Lieferzeiten mehr. Ich zeige dir hier Schritt für Schritt wie du dir Rechte an fertigen, digitalen Produkten kaufst, ein profitablen Shopify Shop aufbaust und gezielte Online Werbung schaltest. Das alles machen wir live am PC zusammen und du siehst meine professionellen Produkte, Onlineshops und Werbekampagnen. Du brauchst dafür nur deinen Laptop und mind. 100€ Startkapital. Du wirst Skills und Wissen erlernen, die dir dein Leben lang nutzen stiften werden.


Was genau wirst du in diesem Kurs lernen?

1. Die richtige Nische finden + Lizenzrechte an fertigen, digitalen Produkten kaufen

2. Schritt für Schritt einen hochprofitablen Shopify Shop aufbauen

3. Digitale Produkte in deinen Shop implementieren und hochwertige Verkaufstexte schreiben

4. Shopify Themes erstellen, ändern und diese kundenfreundlich machen

5. Welche Apps, Frontend und Backend Einstellungen brauchst du

6. Günstig ein Logo erstellen lassen und Domain / Farbe anpassen

7. Professionelle Werbetexte schreiben ( Verkaufspsychologie )

8. Facebook Business Manager einrichten und verstehen!

9. iOS-14 Update richtig einrichten, um gezielter Kunden zu erreichen

10. Werbekampagnen erstellen und Facebook Ads schalten und verwalten

11. Was machen, wenn Werbeanzeigen oder Werbemanager gesperrt wurde?

12. Ab wann Werbung stoppen und wann skalieren um höhere Gewinn einzufahren

Und vieles mehr!


KURSSTRUKTUR

Zuallererst werde ich dich mit dem "digitalen Dropshipping Geschäftsmodell" vertraut machen. Anschließend werden wir zusammen eine Nische für dich suchen. Dabei zeig ich dir wie und wo du dir die Lizenzrechte an professionellen E-Books, Trainingsplänen, Videokurse etc. kaufen kannst. Keine Panik, die Lizenzrechte kosten meist unter 10€ und du kannst das digitale Produkt dann unendlich mal verkaufen. ( Du kannst natürlich auch selber ein Kurs / E-Book erstellen ) Das besondere an diesem Geschäftsmodell ist, dass chinesische Händleranbindungen, Lieferzeiten, Lieferkosten und sogar die Produktkosten wegfallen ( Da du nur einmal die Lizenzrechte kaufen musst ).

Du wirst lernen wie du einen Shopify Shop gezielt für digitale Produkte aufbaust und welche Apps du dafür benötigst. Ich werde dir das im Kurs vormachen, sodass du nur noch per Copy&Paste deinen Shop aufbauen musst. Ich zeige dir was du beachten musst, wenn du Produktbeschreibungen anfertigst, sie in Shopify importierst und die Produkte in die Seite einpflegst. Wir werden individuell für deine Nische ein Logo, Shopname / Farbe und Domain erstellen. 

Sobald wir damit fertig sind, werde ich dich mit verschiedenen Plattformen vertraut machen wie z.B. Facebook Business Manager. Ich werde mit dir Schritt für Schritt verschiedene hochprofitable Facebook Ads erstellen. Dabei lernst du wie man die richtige Zielgruppe für digitale Produkte targetiert und auf was du genau achten musst.

Ich werde LIVE in diesem Kurs einen Shopify Onlineshop aufbauen, Facebook Ads erstellen und skalieren. Du wirst demnach fähig sein mein System 1 zu 1 zu kopieren. Ganz am Ende des Kurses werde ich dir außerdem zeigen wie du deinen Shop, auch wenn er noch keinen einzigen Verkauf gemacht hat, für 150 Euro oder mehr verkaufen kannst.

Leg los, bevor du dich bereit fühlst! Es wird nie den perfekten Moment geben mit etwas anzufangen.

Du hast nichts zu riskieren und viel zu lernen! Wir sehen uns im Kurs :)

KURSSTRUKTUR

Zuallererst werde ich dich mit dem Facebook Business Manager vertraut machen. Unser Tool mit dem wir über den gesamten Kurs arbeiten werden. Phase 5 ist die Endstufe unserer Strategie und wird die 5-stellige Tagesumsätze einbringen. Es ist jedoch ein weiter Weg bis du in Phase 5 ankommst und diese anwenden kannst. Hauptfokus liegt auf Phase 3 & 4.

Ich werde LIVE in diesem Kurs mit dir zusammen eine Kampagne erstellen und diese nach der 5-Phasen Strategie skalieren. Du wirst demnach fähig sein mein System 1 zu 1 zu kopieren. Diese Strategie habe ich selber erstellt und wäre dir dankbar, wenn du diese für dich behältst.

courseDetails.title: NGINX, Apache, SSL Encryption - Certification Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Install, Configure, and Secure NGINX & Apache on an Ubuntu Server using Digital Ocean & Let's Encrypt SSL
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to our latest course, which will guide you through the process of installing, securing, and configuring NGINX or Apache on an Ubuntu web server. You will also learn to encrypt all web traffic, using a Free SSL certificate from Let’s Encrypt.

APACHE Section:

This course begins with exploring the most widely used web server technology available, Apache. Statistics show that Apache is used to run over 65% of all web servers around the world. Understanding how to work with Apache, is an instrumental part of the web development process. Students will learn the following key concepts:

  • Deploying a virtual server on Digital Ocean

  • Working with dynamic, static and floating IPs

  • Using Terminal for remote authentication

  • Installing and configuring LAMP Stack on Ubuntu 18.04

  • Testing PHP

  • Hosting Multiple Domains on one Apache Virtual Server

  • Configuring Virtual Host Files and Directives

  • DNS Zone File Configuration

NGINX Section:

NGINX is now considered the most powerful, efficient, and secure web server technology used to host web applications of all sizes and complexity. The software is open-source, and is designed for maximum performance and stability. It also aims to correct many of the short-falls of Apache, when it comes to delivering content to your end user. NGINX can be used for web serving, reverse proxying, caching, load balancing, media streaming, and much more.

The NGINX Section of this course will help you understand the following key concepts:

  • Understanding the difference between Apache & NGINX

  • Installing NGINX on a Digital Ocean Droplet or any Virtual Server of your choice.

  • Modifying the NGINX Block Configuration file for hosting Websites

  • Installing essential components on NGINX such as MySQL, PHP & PhpMyAdmin

  • Securing PhpMyAdmin using symbolic links and NGINX's built in authentication gateway.

  • Securing your hosted websites with free SSL using Certbot & Let's Encrypt

  • Installing and Configuring WordPress on your NGINX Server

SSL Certificates - Let's Encrypt

This section of the course offers an in-depth look into the role of SSL certificates when it comes to server security and web traffic encryption. We start with a thorough introduction which includes exploring different types of certificates and how they work. From there, students create a droplet on Digital Ocean and configure their own free SSL certificate using Let’s Encrypt Certificate Authority. This section of the course combines theoretical and hands-on training. Students have the opportunity to practice some of the concepts explored in the previous two sections, while also learning about free SSL Certificates, such as Let’s Encrypt.
targetAudiences: Students Interested in learning the Foundations of NGINX, Apache & SSL Encryption
Students interested in learning how SSL Certificates work
Web Developers interested in setting up NGINX on a Ubuntu Server, with MySQL, PHP, & PhpMyAdmin
Web Developers interested in setting up APACHE on Ubuntu with LAMP Stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP)
Students interested in learn how to install and configure WordPress on NGINX

So, if you are ready to dive back into another course and learn a variety of new concepts, hit the sign-up button!

courseDetails.title: Linode: Foundations of Web Server Security
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cloud Service Models | IaaS | Linode Basics | TFA | SSH | Linux | Ubuntu | LAMP Stack | DBMS | Firewalls | SSL
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is designed to provide a comprehensive introduction to cloud computing and the foundations of server security. We cover a range of topics, starting from an introduction to cloud computing and cloud service models to cloud server deployment and configuration using Linode. We also explore the foundations of Linux, LAMP stack installation and configuration, server security, and SSL certificates.

The course begins with an introduction to cloud computing and the different service models available, such as Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS). This offers students a basic understanding of the different types of cloud services available along with various use cases.

Next, the course delves into server deployment and configuration using Linode. Linode is a popular cloud hosting provider that offers a range of services, including virtual private servers (VPS), storage, and networking. Students will learn how to deploy and configure a virtual instance and use it to host a website or application using LAMP Stack. LAMP stands for Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP and is a popular stack used to build dynamic websites and web applications. Students will learn how to install and configure each component of the stack and use it to create a functional website or web application. The course will then cover Linux foundations, where we explore the Linux file system, basic commands, and user accounts.

In the following section students explore server security, including best practices for securing a server and common security threats. Students will learn about firewalls, intrusion detection and prevention systems, and how to secure sensitive data. We will demonstrate how to setup custom ports, hardware firewalls, and software firewalls using UFW.

Finally, the course will cover installing and configuring SSL certificates. SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is a standard security technology for establishing an encrypted link between a web server and a browser. Students will learn how to obtain, install, and configure an SSL certificate to secure their website or web application.

This course is well suited for anyone interested in cloud computing and server administration. By the end, student will be proficient with navigating Linode, while deploying and configuring remote instances using the latest in cloud technology. If this sounds exciting, then hit the enol button and let’s get started.
targetAudiences: Students interested in Cloud Computing
Students interested in Remote Server Deployment and Configuration
Students interested in Server Security
Students interested in the Foundations of Linux
Students interested in LAMP Stack Installation and Configuration
Students interested in how SSL Certificates Works
Students interested in SSL Certificate Installation and Configuration

Assessment Description:

The Web3 expert assessment is a comprehensive evaluation designed to assess an individual's knowledge and expertise in the field of Web3 technology, blockchain, decentralized applications, and related concepts. This assessment is crucial for both employees and companies in the rapidly evolving landscape of decentralized technologies.


For Employees:

Skill Validation: By undertaking the Web3 expert assessment, employees can validate their skills and knowledge in Web3 technology. It demonstrates their competence in understanding blockchain, decentralized systems, smart contracts, and related topics, which are increasingly in demand in various industries.

Career Advancement: Becoming a certified Web3 expert can open up numerous career opportunities. With the growing adoption of Web3 solutions, companies are actively seeking professionals who possess the skills and expertise to develop and implement decentralized applications. This assessment can serve as a strong credential to advance one's career in this emerging field.

Industry Recognition: Achieving a high score or certification in the Web3 expert assessment showcases an employee's commitment to staying updated with the latest technologies and industry trends. It enhances their professional reputation and increases their chances of being recognized as an authority in the field.


For Companies:

Hiring and Recruitment: The Web3 expert assessment provides companies with a reliable benchmark to assess the proficiency and expertise of potential candidates. It helps in identifying individuals who possess the necessary skills to contribute to the development and implementation of Web3 solutions. This assessment enables companies to make informed hiring decisions and build a competent team of Web3 professionals.

Quality Assurance: Employing certified Web3 experts ensures a high standard of quality in the development and deployment of Web3 solutions. Companies can trust these professionals to possess a deep understanding of the underlying technologies, security considerations, and best practices. This leads to more reliable and robust implementations, reducing the risk of vulnerabilities or flaws.

Innovation and Competitive Edge: Web3 technology has the potential to revolutionize various industries by enabling new business models and enhancing operational efficiency. Having Web3 experts within the company ensures a deep understanding of these technologies, allowing companies to explore innovative solutions, adapt to emerging trends, and gain a competitive edge in their respective industries.


Web3 Solutions Development and Marketing for Career Building:

Proficiency in Web3 solutions development and marketing offers several career-building advantages:


Growing Demand: As Web3 technology gains traction, the demand for professionals skilled in Web3 solutions development and marketing is on the rise. Companies across industries are actively exploring the implementation of decentralized applications, tokenization, decentralized finance (DeFi), and more. Building expertise in these areas opens doors to exciting and well-paid career opportunities.

Early-Mover Advantage: Web3 is still an emerging field, and being an early adopter and expert in Web3 solutions development and marketing can provide a significant advantage. Early movers have the opportunity to shape the industry, contribute to cutting-edge projects, and establish themselves as thought leaders and influencers.

Diverse Industry Applications: Web3 technology has applications in various industries, including finance, healthcare, supply chain management, gaming, and more. By specializing in Web3 solutions development and marketing, professionals can explore career opportunities across different sectors, broadening their horizons and allowing for interdisciplinary collaboration.

Entrepreneurial Opportunities: The decentralized nature of Web3 technology encourages entrepreneurship. Skilled professionals can leverage their expertise to develop their own Web3-based applications, launch startups, or contribute to open-source projects. This opens avenues for innovation, creativity, and potential financial success.


The Web3 expert assessment holds significant importance for both employees and companies. For employees, it validates skills, aids career advancement, and enhances industry recognition. For companies, it assists in hiring top talent, ensuring quality assurance, and fostering innovation. Additionally, building expertise in Web3 solutions development and marketing offers individuals numerous career-building opportunities in an evolving and promising field.

Guiding Recruitment Strategies: As the metaverse industry expands, companies will seek to attract top talent with the required expertise. Strategic Decision-Making: Companies operating within the metaverse space must make informed decisions regarding technology adoption, product development, marketing strategies, and more. Having employees with a deep understanding of the metaverse through the assessment equips companies with the insights needed to make strategic choices aligned with industry trends and consumer demands.


Building a Career in Metaverse Development and Marketing:

The Metaverse Expert Assessment serves as an invaluable resource for individuals looking to build a career in the metaverse industry. By acquiring expertise in metaverse development and marketing, individuals can position themselves for exciting and dynamic roles within organizations at the forefront of this transformative technology.

Technical Roles: Metaverse development requires a range of technical skills, including programming, virtual reality design, 3D modeling, and user interface development. The assessment provides a foundation for individuals seeking careers as metaverse developers, designers, or software engineers.

Marketing and Business Roles: As the metaverse expands, companies will require professionals with a deep understanding of metaverse marketing strategies, user behavior, and monetization models. Research and Innovation: The metaverse is a frontier for innovation, offering exciting opportunities for research and development. Individuals with a passion for exploring new technologies, user experiences, and the societal impact of the metaverse can leverage the assessment to build careers in research, innovation, and thought leadership.


The Metaverse Expert Assessment plays a vital role in unlocking opportunities for employees and companies within the metaverse industry. Career Advancement: With the growing adoption of blockchain technology, certified professionals are in high demand across various industries. Industry Recognition: A Blockchain Expert Certification is a recognized validation of an individual's expertise in blockchain technology. It establishes credibility and demonstrates a commitment to professional growth, garnering respect within the industry.


Versatile Skill Set: Blockchain expertise encompasses various areas such as cryptography, decentralized applications, smart contracts, and consensus mechanisms. This diverse skill set allows professionals to explore roles in blockchain development, project management, consulting, and research, providing versatility in career options.


Future-Proofing Careers: Blockchain technology is poised to disrupt numerous industries, including finance, supply chain, healthcare, and more. By gaining blockchain expertise, employees future-proof their careers, ensuring relevance and adaptability in the evolving job market.

Innovation and Competitiveness: Companies that embrace blockchain technology gain a competitive advantage by harnessing its transformative potential. Hiring certified blockchain experts enables organizations to innovate, explore new business models, and develop blockchain-based solutions that enhance operational efficiency and customer experience.


Effective Implementation: Blockchain implementations require specialized knowledge to navigate the complexities and challenges associated with decentralized systems. Certified professionals possess the necessary skills to lead and manage blockchain initiatives, ensuring successful and effective implementation within the organization.


Risk Mitigation: Blockchain technology offers enhanced security, transparency, and immutability, mitigating risks such as fraud, data tampering, and identity theft. By hiring certified blockchain experts, companies can leverage this technology to safeguard their digital assets and protect against potential threats.


Industry Partnerships and Collaboration: Many blockchain initiatives involve collaboration among multiple organizations. Having certified experts facilitates partnerships and collaborations, as companies with certified professionals gain credibility and trust among potential collaborators.


Talent Attraction and Retention: The demand for blockchain professionals exceeds the current supply, making it a highly competitive job market. Companies offering blockchain certifications to their employees demonstrate a commitment to fostering talent development, attracting top talent, and retaining skilled professionals within the organization.


Building a Career in Blockchain:

Building a career in blockchain provides numerous opportunities for growth and impact. With the increasing adoption of blockchain across industries, professionals with blockchain expertise are sought after for roles such as blockchain developers, solution architects, consultants, project managers, and researchers.


Additionally, blockchain professionals can contribute to the development of decentralized applications, explore entrepreneurship opportunities through blockchain startups, or work in regulatory and policy-making bodies shaping the future of blockchain technology.


Continuous learning and staying updated with the latest advancements in blockchain technology is crucial for career growth. Pursuing advanced certifications, attending industry conferences, and actively engaging in blockchain communities helps professionals stay at the forefront of this rapidly evolving field.


The Blockchain Expert Certification holds immense importance for both employees and companies. For employees, it provides specialized knowledge, enhances career prospects, and establishes industry recognition. By investing in blockchain certifications, individuals and organizations can unlock the transformative potential of blockchain technology, contributing to their personal and professional growth, as well as the overall advancement of the industry.

    • Here are some tips and tricks for using Google Bard:

      • Use keywords When you're generating text, use keywords to help Google Bard understand what you're looking for. For example, if you're generating a poem, you might use keywords like "love" or "romance."

      • Use prompts You can also use prompts to help Google Bard generate text. For example, you might use a prompt like "Write a story about a robot who falls in love with a human."

      • Use feedback If you're not happy with the text that Google Bard generates, you can give it feedback. For example, you might tell it to generate more creative text or to generate text that is more specific to your needs.

      • Explore different models Google Bard has different models that you can use to generate text. Each model has its own strengths and weaknesses, so you can experiment to find the one that works best for you.

      • Use different settings Google Bard also has different settings that you can use to generate text. For example, you can use the "creative" setting to generate more creative text or the "informative" setting to generate more informative text.

      • Take breaks Generating text can be a lot of work, so it's important to take breaks. If you're feeling overwhelmed, take a few minutes to relax and come back to it later.

      • Have fun Generating text can be a lot of fun, so enjoy the process. Experiment with different ideas and see what kind of text you can create.

  • Examples of how Google Bard is being used. This series would share examples of how Google Bard is being used by businesses, individuals, and organizations.

    • Here are some examples of how Google Bard is being used:

      • By businesses

        • Google Bard is being used by businesses to generate marketing materials, such as blog posts, social media posts, and website content.

        • Google Bard is also being used by businesses to generate customer service chatbots.

        • Google Bard is also being used by businesses to generate educational tools, such as interactive videos and games.

        • Google Bard is also being used by organizations to generate legal documents, such as contracts and agreements.

        • Google Bard is also being used by organizations to generate financial reports.

  • The future of Google Bard. This series would explore the future of Google Bard and how it could be used to solve problems and create new opportunities.

    • Google Bard will continue to improve Google Bard is a large language model, and like all large language models, it will continue to improve over time. This means that Google Bard will be able to generate text that is more creative, more informative, and more accurate.

    • Google Bard will become more accessible Google Bard is currently in beta, but it is expected to be released to the public in the near future. This means that more people will be able to use Google Bard to generate text for a variety of purposes.

    • Google Bard will be used in new ways Google Bard is a powerful tool, and it is likely that people will find new and innovative ways to use it. For example, Google Bard could be used to create virtual assistants, to generate educational content, or to create new forms of art.

    • Google Bard will have an impact on society Google Bard is a powerful tool that will have an impact on society. courseDetails.title: Aprende JavaScript de CERO a EXPERTO
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende JavaScript sin ningún conocimiento previo
courseDetails.longDescription:
JavaScript es un lenguaje de programación ligero, interpretado o compilado justo a tiempo, con funciones de primera clase. Aunque es más conocido como lenguaje de scripting para páginas web, muchos entornos ajenos a los navegadores también lo utilizan, como Node.js, Apache CouchDB y Adobe Acrobat. JavaScript es un lenguaje basado en prototipos, multiparadigma, monohilo y dinámico, que admite estilos orientados a objetos, imperativos y declarativos (por ejemplo, programación funcional).

JavaScript es el lenguaje de programación más popular del mundo. Junto con HTML (que se utiliza para la estructura de la página web), y CSS (que se utiliza para el estilo); JavaScript (que se utiliza para la funcionalidad), se considera uno de los lenguajes fundamentales para el desarrollo web. Aun así, JavaScript está en todas partes, ya no es un lenguaje exclusivo de la web, podemos encontrárnoslo en los servidores, en las aplicaciones escritorio multiplataforma,  y en muchos otros ámbitos. Por lo tanto, saber programar en JavaScript puede ofrecer grandes oportunidades laborales.

Este curso de JavaScript te llevará desde principiante hasta profesional. Este curso está diseñado desde la perspectiva de un estudiante que no tiene conocimientos previos de programación y que es un principiante en JavaScript. Además, está definido de una forma en la que se va de los aspectos más básicos a los más complejos, para que el alumno pueda ir adquiriendo las bases de la programación en JavaScript de la mejor manera posible.

Entre los contenidos de este curso se encuentran los siguientes:

  • Sintaxis básica de JavaScript

  • Variables y tipos de datos

  • Trabajar con variables de texto

  • Trabajar con variables numéricas

  • Estructuras de datos

  • Sentencias condicionales

  • Bucles iterativos

  • Declaración de funciones

  • Programación Orientada a Objetos

Por lo tanto, a lo largo de este completo curso, cubrimos una gran cantidad de habilidades y técnicas que incluyen las aspectos más esenciales para programar en JavaScript y en cualquier otro lenguaje de programación.

Al realizar este curso, te convertirás en un programador de JavaScript fluido y serás tan bueno que podrás conseguir una oferta de trabajo razonable como desarrollador de JavaScript y utilizar el lenguaje profesionalmente.
targetAudiences: Este curso está dirigido a cualquier persona que esté interesada en aprender a programar con JavaScript

courseDetails.title: French proverbs for intermediate students
courseDetails.shortDescription: Understand both language and culture in French
courseDetails.longDescription:
Proverbs are short and pithy statements. They offer life advice, wisdom or a general truth. Proverbs are often so common that native speakers would use them in conversations without even realizing it. A proverb can be a shortcut in explaining something. They communicate an accepted message in a few well-worn and well-known words.

Illustrating a point to be made, proverbs are oftentimes metaphorical or symbolic in nature. Some proverbs can be reflective of a specific culture. However, the majority is widely embraced and quite often passed down through generations and generations. In fact, some of the earliest recorded proverbs date back to 2000 BC. Even to the ancient Sumerians who would write them on stone tablets.

A few examples:

  • An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
    Chaque jour une pomme conserve son homme.

  • Barking dogs seldom bite. 
    Chien qui aboie ne mord pas.

  • As you make your bed, so you must lie.
    Comme on fait son lit, on se couche.

  • You can't teach an old dog new tricks.
    Ce n'est pas aux vieux singes qu'on apprend à faire des grimaces.

  • When in doubt, leave it out. 
    Dans le doute, abstiens-toi.

A key element in learning a language and a culture is proverbs. It's only when you're able to use proverbs properly that you can really set yourself apart and be considered a professional or even a native speaker.

Set the bar a bit higher and become an expert in French with these common proverbs, you'll amaze a few people along the way.
targetAudiences: Students who want to go from intermediate French to professional

courseDetails.title: The Complete Persian Language Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Farsi - Learn Persian - Farsi Language TPRS/TPR Method, Audio Submissions, Story by Native
courseDetails.longDescription:
The Complete Persian Language Course Farsi Course:: Master the Farsi Language Using the TPRS/TPR Method, Audio Submissions, and Stories Told by Native Speakers

Persian is a pluricentric language predominantly spoken and used officially within Iran, Afghanistan, and Tajikistan in three mutually intelligible standard varieties, namely Iranian Persian, Dari Persian (officially named Dari since 1958), and Tajiki Persian (officially named Tajik since the Soviet era). It is also spoken natively in the Tajik variety by a significant population within Uzbekistan, as well as within other regions with a Persianate history in the cultural sphere of Greater Iran. It is written officially within Iran and Afghanistan in the Persian alphabet, a derivation of the Arabic script, and within Tajikistan in the Tajik alphabet, a derivation of Cyrillic.

In this class, I  provide you with every service so you learn and speak Persian effortlessly. I will use these methods for teaching:

  • Teaching you storytelling based on the TPRS method. This is how you learn Persian speaking from me. And you practice through video.

Sample TypeScript Interview Question

Question: What is the default access modifier for members of a class in TypeScript?

Option 1: Private

Option 2: Public

Option 3: Protected

Option 4: Internal

Correct Option: 2

Explanation: In TypeScript, the default access modifier for members of a class is public. This means that by default, all members of a class are accessible from outside the class. If you do not specify an access modifier for a member of a class, it will be considered public. To make a member private, you can use the private keyword in front of the member declaration. Private members are only accessible from within the class and cannot be accessed from outside the class. [referance ulr]

The questions in this test are written by experienced facility managers and are designed to closely resemble the types of questions that you'll encounter on the actual CFM exam.

The CFM exam covers five competency areas: operations and maintenance, project management, finance and business, leadership and strategy, and sustainability.

This test includes questions from all of these areas to help you develop a well-rounded understanding of facility management principles and practices.

By taking this test, you'll gain valuable practice and preparation for the CFM exam.

You'll also be able to identify areas where you may need to focus additional study and review in order to pass the CFM exam and earn your certification.

Enroll in this 360 question test today and take the first step toward becoming a Certified Facility Manager!

Here is some additional information about the CFM exam:

  • The exam is based on the IFMA's Facility Management Body of Knowledge (FMBoK) and covers the following competency areas: operations and maintenance, project management, finance and business, leadership and strategy, and sustainability.

  • The exam is administered through Prometric testing centers, which are located in various cities throughout the world.

  • The cost of the exam varies depending on whether the candidate is an IFMA member or non-member. As of March 2023, the cost for IFMA members is $825, and the cost for non-members is $1,025.

  • To be eligible to take the exam, candidates must meet certain requirements, including a minimum of four years of facility management experience and a bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience.

  • The passing score for the CFM exam is 75%. Candidates who pass the exam will receive a certificate indicating their certification as a Certified Facility Manager.

  • If a candidate does not pass the exam on their first attempt, they may retake the exam after a waiting period of 90 days. However, they must pay the full exam fee again for each attempt.

Overall, the CFM exam is a rigorous test of a candidate's facility management knowledge and skills. Earning the CFM certification can be a valuable credential for facility managers looking to advance their careers and demonstrate their expertise in the field.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT for Data Science and Machine Learning
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to build Data Science and Machine Learning Projects by Leveraging the Power of ChatGPT.
courseDetails.longDescription:
WELCOME TO THE COURSE - ChatGPT for DATA SCIENCE AND MACHINE LEARNING


ChatGPT is an AI-powered conversational agent based on the GPT-3.5 architecture developed by OpenAI. As a language model, ChatGPT is capable of understanding and generating human-like responses to a wide variety of topics, making it a versatile tool for chatbot development, customer service, and content creation.Furthermore, ChatGPT is designed to be highly scalable and customizable, allowing developers to fine-tune its responses and integrate it into various applications and platforms. This flexibility makes ChatGPT a valuable asset for businesses seeking to enhance customer engagement and streamline their operations.


By leveraging ChatGPT's advanced natural language processing capabilities, data scientists can improve their workflows and achieve better results in their projects.


ChatGPT can be a useful tool for Programmers and Data Scientists in various ways.


  1. Code Generation: ChatGPT can generate code snippets based on natural language prompts, which can be useful for programmers who need to quickly prototype ideas or generate boilerplate code. By training ChatGPT on a corpus of code examples, programmers can create a language model that can generate syntactically correct code snippets for a variety of programming languages.

  2. Documentation Generation: ChatGPT can also be used to generate documentation for code. By training ChatGPT on a corpus of code comments and documentation, programmers can create a language model that can generate documentation for code snippets or entire codebases automatically.

  3. Code Optimization: ChatGPT can be used to optimize code by suggesting ways to simplify or optimize code snippets. By training ChatGPT on a corpus of optimized code examples, programmers can create a language model that can suggest improvements to existing code, which can help to reduce code complexity, improve performance, and increase maintainability.

  4. Error Handling: ChatGPT can also be used to improve error handling by suggesting solutions to common coding errors. By training ChatGPT on a corpus of code examples that contain errors and their solutions, programmers can create a language model that can suggest solutions to common coding errors automatically.

SO THIS IS ONE COMPLETE COURSE THAT WILL TEACH YOU ABOUT DATA SCIENCE AND MACHINE LEARNING AND HOW YOU CAN LEVERAGE THE POWER OF ChatGPT FOR A FASTER AND MORE EFFICIENT PROJECT DEVELOPMENT.
targetAudiences: Anybody with an interest in Data Science and Machine Learning.
Anybody who wants to learn to develop Data Science and Machine Learning Projects in a quick and efficient manner by leveraging the power of ChatGPT .
Python developers who are curious about Data Science, Machine Learning and ChatGPT.

ChatGPT를 사용해 매력적인 콘텐츠와 카피를 생성해 보세요. 기사, 블로그, 에세이, 광고 카피, SNS 스크립트, 영업 카피 등 다양한 유형의 글을 다룹니다. 코드와 가사를 통해 나만의 노래를 생성하고, 팟캐스트 스크립트, 필요에 맞는 콘텐츠 제작 방법을 학습합니다. SEO와 키워드에 콘텐츠를 최적화하고, 효율적인 제품 설명을 만들고, SNS 게시물을 생성하는 방법을 학습합니다. 사례 연구를 통해 아이콘을 생성하고 효율적인 광고와 랜딩 페이지를 만드는 방법을 학습합니다.


  • 순식간에 독특하고 매력적인 콘텐츠 생성하기

  • 프롬프트 엔지니어링을 통해 필요에 맞는 카피 완성하기

  • 대량 생성을 통해 그 어느 때보다 생산성 향상하기


  1. ChatGPT: 빠르게 학습하고, 연구하고, 취업 기회를 준비합니다

ChatGPT를 학습 및 연구에 활용합니다. 필요한 것에 집중하고, 비즈니스의 성장을 위해 질문을 던지고, 취업 면접을 준비하는 방법을 학습하고, 다른 사람의 성공으로부터 배웁니다. 또한 일반적인 학습 및 튜토리얼, 텍스트, 기사 분석, 복잡한 수학 문제 풀이, 에세이 작성에 대해서도 다룹니다. 정보를 합성하기 위한 학습 활동을 진행할 것입니다.


  • ChatGPT를 사용해 빠른 속도로 학습하는 미래에 뛰어듭니다

  • 개인 및 시장 조사를 재정의합니다

  • 방정식을 풀고, 현실적인 모의 면접을 진행하고, AI를 통해 최고의 기회를 잡습니다


  1. ChatGPT: 코드 생성, 알고리즘, 디버깅, 문서화

이 챕터는 코딩에 대해 궁금한 분들을 위한 챕터이며 ChatGPT를 코드 생성, 알고리즘, 문서화, 코드 디버깅에 사용하는 방법을 학습합니다. 예시와 함께 단계별로 안내해 드리며, ChatGPT를 활용해 프로그래밍 기술을 향상하는 방법을 학습합니다.


  • AI 코딩의 세계를 탐험하고 습득합니다

  • ChatGPT를 사용해 생산성을 10배 향상합니다

  • AI로 작업하는 놀라운 속도를 경험합니다


  1. Midjourney: 설치, 설정, 워크플로, 명령어, 프롬프트 작성, 스타일화

반복, 업스케일링, 리믹싱의 개념을 알아보며 생성형 아트의 세계에 대해 더 자세히 살펴봅니다. 출력을 반복하는 것을 더 자세히 알아보고 이를 통해 아트워크를 개선하는 방법을 논의합니다. 그런 다음 업스케일링의 과정을 논의하며 더 크고 복잡한 작품을 생성하는 방법을 알아봅니다. 리믹싱의 개념도 살펴보며 새롭고 흥미로운 아트를 생성하는 데 어떻게 사용할 수 있는지 알아봅니다. 마지막으로 스타일화 기법을 살펴보며 나의 아트워크에 어떻게 적용할 수 있을지 논의합니다.


  • 간단한 텍스트로 상상력에 생명을 불어넣습니다

  • 기발한 아이디어로 기존의 이미지를 리믹싱합니다

  • 생성형 아트 프롬프트를 통해 꿈의 문을 엽니다


  1. Midjourney: 반복, 업스케일링, 이미지 비율, 리믹싱

생성형 아트에 대해 계속 알아보며 고급 파라미터를 통해 독특한 방식으로 생성하는 방법에 집중합니다. 모델 버전 파라미터를 더 자세히 살펴보는 것에서 시작해 이를 통해 어떻게 더 복잡하고 다양한 작품을 생성할 수 있는지 논의합니다. 그런 다음 고급 프롬프트 파라미터로 넘어가 아트워크를 미세 조정하는 방법을 알아봅니다. 두 개의 레퍼런스 사진을 섞어 아주 새로운 것을 생성하는 등 아트워크에 레퍼런스 사진을 사용하는 개념도 알아봅니다. 마지막으로 광고에 생성형 아트를 어떻게 활용할 수 있는지 알아보며 캐릭터 대량 생성의 사용 사례를 살펴봅니다.


  • 고급 프롬프트 모디파이어를 사용해 아트워크를 커스터마이징합니다

  • 반복을 통해 완벽한 작품을 완성합니다

  • 생성형 아트의 무한한 가능성을 살펴봅니다


  1. DALL-E 2: 웹사이트 인터페이스, 레이아웃, 프롬프트 작성, 배리에이션 생성

달리 2의 사용법을 알아보고 웹사이트 인터페이스 및 레이아웃을 살펴봅니다. 프롬프트 작성 기능을 사용하는 방법을 알아보고 여러 파라미터로 배리에이션을 생성하는 방법을 살펴봅니다. 예시 프롬프트를 작성하는 방법을 훈련하고 사용할 수 있는 프롬프트의 다양한 유형에 대해 학습합니다. 프롬프트를 사고 파는 과정을 안내하며 영감을 얻을 수 있는 리소스를 제공합니다. 달리 2의 규칙과 키보드 단축키에 대해서도 학습합니다.


  • 강력한 프롬프트 기능을 학습하고 놀라운 비주얼의 배리에이션을 생성합니다

  • 전문가처럼 달리 2의 인터페이스를 탐색하고 영감을 얻을 수 있는 많은 리소스 속에서 프롬프트 마켓플레이스의 비밀을 알아봅니다

  • 시장을 변화시키는 최신 AI 기술에 대해 알아보고 파라미터와 키보드 단축키에 대한 귀중한 인사이트를 얻어 창의력을 한 단계 끌어올립니다


  1. DALL-E 2: 인 페인팅, 아웃 페인팅, 여러 개의 이미지 섞기

인페인팅, 아웃페인팅, 여러 개의 이미지 섞기 등 달리 2의 놀라운 기능에 대해 알아봅니다. 이러한 기능을 사용해 놀랍고 독창적인 아트 작품을 생성하는 방법을 학습합니다. 여러 이미지를 결합해 완전히 새로운 것을 생성하거나 달리 2를 사용해 손으로는 만들기 어렵거나 불가능한 아트를 생성하는 방법을 학습합니다. 두 개의 레퍼런스 사진을 하나로 합치고 웹사이트의 기능을 사용해 완전히 새로운 작품을 생성하는 방법을 보여드립니다. 이 섹션을 완료하면 달리 2를 더 깊이 이해하고 달리 2를 사용해 나만의 아트를 생성하는 방법을 익힐 것입니다.


  • 달리 2의 강력한 기능을 통해 독창적이고 놀라운 비주얼의 아트 작품을 생성하는 방법을 익힙니다

  • 달리 2의 무한한 가능성을 탐험하며 예술적 창작성을 새로운 경지로 끌어올립니다

  • 달리 2의 기능을 더 자세히 알아보며 창의력을 더욱 향상합니다


  1. 생성형 AI를 사용한 임시 작업, 부업, 프리랜스, 온라인 제품 판매

다양한 부업 아이디어를 통해 추가 수익 창출 기회를 만들어 보세요. 상품을 제작하고 판매하며, 디지털 제품을 판매하고, 뉴스, 요약, 튜토리얼, 하우투 채널을 만들고, Quora 및 SNS에서 질문에 답변하고, 온라인 강좌를 생성하는 방법을 학습합니다. 또한 로고를 디자인하고, 제품 제작 아이디어를 떠올리고, 비즈니스 계약서를 작성하는 방법도 알려드립니다. 새로운 사업을 구상하기 위한 학습 활동을 진행할 것입니다.


  • 다양한 부업 아이디어를 발견하고 새로운 AI 기술을 통해 수익을 창출하는 방법을 알아봅니다

  • 나만의 브랜드를 구축하고 온라인에 노출되며 핵심적인 기술을 개발하는 방법을 학습합니다

  • 새로운 사업을 구상하고, 계획하고, 출시하는 데 도움이 되는 학습 활동에 새 지식을 동원하고, 추가 수익 창출 기회를 만들며 재정적으로 독립할 수 있는 기반을 만들 수 있습니다


  1. 생성형 AI를 사용한 비즈니스, 마케팅 이메일, 아이디어 구상, 생산성

AI 툴과 ChatGPT가 어떻게 비즈니스 세계에 영향을 미치고 있는지 이해하고 혁신적인 비즈니스 아이디어를 창출하는 방법을 알아봅니다. 독창적인 제품 이름을 만들고, 비즈니스 커뮤니케이션 및 분할 테스트에 대한 인사이트, 상업 계약서를 작성하는 방법을 학습합니다. 또한 ChatGPT를 활용해 이메일을 신속하게 응답하고 대량의 마케팅 이메일을 전송하는 방법을 학습합니다. 마지막으로 새로운 제품을 만드는 데 도움이 되는 학습 활동을 진행합니다.


  • 프롬프트 엔지니어링을 통해 AI의 획기적인 영향력을 나에게 맞게 활용합니다

  • 독창적인 비즈니스 사업을 구상하고 커뮤니케이션 전략을 최적화하는 등 핵심적인 비즈니스 역량을 습득합니다

  • 최신 기술을 활용해 최신 트렌드 및 성공을 위한 모범 사례에 대한 귀중한 인사이트를 얻어보세요.


  1. AI 영상: 말하는 AI 아바타, 대량의 틱톡, 릴스, 쇼츠 생성하기

Synthesia, Vidyo, Runway 등 사용할 수 있는 다양한 AI 영상 툴에 대해 알아보고 놀라운 비주얼의 영상을 생성하는 방법을 학습합니다. 사용 사례를 살펴보며 시작하는 방법을 안내하고 영상을 개인화하고 완전히 새로운 것을 만들 수 있도록 다양한 파라미터를 수정하는 방법을 학습합니다.


  • 저희의 새로운 AI 영상 팀을 만나보세요

  • 최신 AI를 사용해 매력적인 영상을 생성해 고객을 사로잡아 보세요

  • 영상을 개인화하고 순식간에 독창적이고 임팩트 있는 콘텐츠를 생성하는 방법을 학습합니다


  1. AI 사진: 사진이 말하도록 만들고, 포토샵을 대체하는 AI 툴을 알아보고, 워터마크를 제거합니다

D-ID, Leiapix, WaterMarkRemover 등의 AI 사진 툴에 대해 알아보고 사진을 편집하고 개선해 생명을 불어넣는 방법을 학습합니다. 창의력에 영감을 줄 리소스를 제공하며 툴이 제공하는 다양한 기능 및 파라미터에 대해 학습합니다. 이러한 툴을 사용해 나만의 아트 작품을 생성하는 연습을 해볼 것입니다.


  • 상상도 못했던 방식으로 사진을 개선, 편집, 변환하기

  • 이러한 AI 사진 툴의 무한한 가능성을 살펴보고 고유 기능 및 파라미터를 통해 나의 비전과 스타일을 담은 개인화된 이미지를 생성합니다.

  • 풍부한 리소스로부터 영감을 얻습니다


  1. AI 문서 작성 및 복제: 구글 시트, 메시지 자동화, 데이터 추출

Grammarly, Copygenius, Fact GPT 등의 다양한 AI 문서 작성 툴에 대해 알아보고 글을 개선할 방법을 살펴봅니다. 철자 확인, 어조 분석, 표절 감지, 콘텐츠 생성에 대해 알려드립니다. 또한 툴이 제공하는 다양한 파라미터 및 설정을 알아보며 필요에 따라 변경하는 방법을 학습합니다.


  • 다양한 AI 툴을 결합해 완벽한 어조, 문법, 구문, 스타일, 억양을 완성합니다

  • 효율적인 커뮤니케이션을 습득하고 AI를 사용해 고객의 관심을 얻습니다

  • 필요에 맞게 커스터마이징할 수 있는 툴의 다양한 파라미터와 설정에 대해 알아봅니다


  1. AI 음악: 음악 제작을 위한 AI 툴 통합, 구글의 AI 음악 제작기

AIVA와 MusicLM 등 다양한 AI 음악 툴에 대해 알아보며 이를 사용해 나만의 음악을 생성하는 방법을 학습합니다. AI 음악의 세계를 살펴보며 버튼 클릭만으로 음악을 만들어 봅니다. 이러한 툴을 사용해 나만의 음악을 제작하는 연습을 해 봅니다.


  • AI 음악의 세계를 살펴봅니다

  • 전에 없던 방식으로 작곡해 봅니다

  • 곧 출시될 놀라운 툴에 대해 미리 살펴봅니다


  1. AI 음성: 팟캐스트 품질로 모든 음성을 고치고, 텍스트에서 음성을 생성하고, 목소리를 복제합니다

Resemble, Wellsaidlabs, Murf 등 다양한 AI 음성 툴에 대해 알아봅니다! 팟캐스트나 영상 내레이션 등 다양한 프로젝트를 위해 현실감 있는 목소리를 생성하는 방법을 살펴봅니다. 필요에 따라 커스터마이징할 수 있는 툴의 다양한 기능 및 파라미터에 대해 알아볼 것입니다.


  • AI 음성을 통해 텍스트에 생명을 불어넣습니다

  • AI를 통해 여러분의 목소리를 복제합니다

  • 팟캐스트, 영상, 프레젠테이션에 AI 내레이터를 사용해 봅니다

courseDetails.title: Cómo Ganar Dinero con YouTube 2023 | Curso de YouTube 2023
courseDetails.shortDescription: Guía completa para comenzar un canal de YouTube, obtener suscriptores y reproducciones y ganar dinero con tus videos.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Estás aquí porque quieres crear un popular canal de YouTube, ¿verdad?


Tal vez eres nuevo en YouTube, o quizás tienes algo de experiencia pero necesitas ayuda para hacer crecer tu canal existente.

YouTube es el lugar perfecto para hacer crecer su propia marca, atraer tráfico a su sitio web y ganar dinero con los anuncios de YouTube y sus promociones de productos y servicios. Y este es el curso perfecto para que comiences tu canal de YouTube.

Cualquiera que sea su motivación para comenzar un canal de YouTube, ha venido al lugar correcto.


¡PONIENDO EN PRACTICA TODO LO APRENDIDO!


Cómo Ganar Dinero con YouTube | Curso de YouTube, es el curso más completo que encontrará en Internet, lleno de trucos y estrategias para crecer y ganar dinero con YouTube.

Es el único lugar con todo lo que necesita para comenzar a crear videos profesionales que obtengan miles de visitas y suscriptores, ¡y finalmente le hagan ganar dinero!

Cómo Ganar Dinero con YouTube | Curso de YouTube, es un curso rápido y eficaz que te lleva de cero habilidades a un completo canal de YouTube con videos, vistas y suscriptores de alta calidad.

Si bien hay muchos cursos de YouTube que se centran en aspectos específicos de la construcción de un canal de YouTube, es difícil encontrar un curso integral como este, que sea para principiantes completos y para cualquier persona que necesite aumentar rápidamente su audiencia de YouTube.

Este curso está diseñado para cualquier persona que haga videos (o quiera hacer videos) y quiera hacer crecer su marca con un canal de YouTube. Entonces, si eres un novato completo o alguien con un canal que necesita ayuda, estás en el lugar correcto.


EN ESTE CURSO, APRENDERÁS:

  • Cómo crear tu propio canal de YouTube paso a paso.

  • Cómo realizar transmisiones en directo desde un canal de YouTube.

  • Cómo crear un logotipo, una portada y miniaturas para tu canal de YouTube usando el programa Canva.

  • Cómo crear miniaturas en las que se puede hacer clic para obtener más vistas.

  • Cómo usar todas las funciones de YouTube desde el celular.

  • Cómo ganar dinero con un canal de YouTube.


MEJORA TU CANAL DE YOUTUBE, OBTÉN MÁS VISITAS Y SUSCRIPTORES Y GANA MÁS DINERO

Independientemente de cuál sea su nivel de experiencia o qué tipo de cámara utiliza, este curso en profundidad está diseñado para brindarle todo lo que necesita para lanzar un canal de YouTube exitoso.

Ya sea que desee crear un canal para promocionar su negocio, enseñar una habilidad o simplemente compartir su historia de vida a través de vlogs, al comprender qué es lo que hace que un canal de YouTube sea exitoso, puede replicar y obtener más visitas, más suscriptores y ganar dinero en su propio canal. Este curso te muestra exactamente cómo hacerlo.


¡LLEGÓ LA HORA DE COMENZAR A USAR YOUTUBE PARA HACER CRECER TU NEGOCIO Y TU MARCA PERSONAL!


Este curso está dirigido a enseñar a los nuevos usuarios de YouTube lo que se necesita para crear excelentes videos y ganar dinero con ellos. La mayoría de las lecciones son tutoriales prácticos donde le explicamos no solo lo que se necesita para tener éxito, sino también dónde le mostramos exactamente cómo hacerlo.

Comenzará con lo básico: las mejores prácticas para todos los usuarios de YouTube. Estos consejos te pondrán en la mentalidad de un YouTuber.


Aprenderás cómo usar la plataforma de YouTube. Se registrará para obtener una cuenta, se verificará como socio de YouTube y sabrá cómo navegar por YouTube Studio.


A continuación, aprenderá a hacer excelentes videos con equipos profesionales y económicos. Aprenderás cómo grabar un gran video con cualquier cámara, cómo grabar un gran audio, cómo encender videos con una configuración de bricolaje barata y cómo editar videos de manera eficiente.


Después de aprender a crear videos asombrosos, aprenderá a publicarlos en su canal de YouTube con excelentes títulos, descripciones y etiquetas que son compatibles con SEO y le ofrecerán la mayor cantidad de visitas. Incluso aprenderá a diseñar y cargar una miniatura personalizada que incremente sus vistas. Aprenderá otras estrategias de optimización para obtener la mayor cantidad de visitas y suscriptores.


Al aprender a usar el análisis, sabrá qué videos funcionan y cuáles no. Esto lo ayudará a hacer crecer rápidamente su canal de YouTube con la creación de videos inteligentes, solo haciendo videos que sepa que funcionarán.


Por último, aprenderás cómo ganar dinero con YouTube. Existen varias formas en las que aprenderá cómo ganar dinero con sus videos de YouTube, incluidos los anuncios, los productos de YouTube Red, digitales y físicos, el patrocinio y el financiamiento colectivo.


Al final de este curso, tendrá un canal de YouTube del que estará orgulloso. Estarás haciendo videos de alta calidad que tu audiencia amará. Obtendrá cada vez más suscriptores para aumentar la fortaleza de su marca. Y estarás ganando dinero con tu canal de YouTube.

courseDetails.title: Cinematography Masterclass: The Complete Videography Guide
courseDetails.shortDescription: 9 Steps to Setup, Light, Record Audio & Shoot Your Videos Like a Filmmaking Pro
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you want your videos to be better looking, sounding, creative, shareable, engaging, and impressive to watch?

Are you wanting to get the most out of shooting on your smartphone, DSLR, or mirrorless camera?

Perfect! You've made it to the right video production course!


By the end of this course, you'll have the skillset and film school level understanding of:

1. First Hand Film Set Experience

To begin, you'll join me on the set of a high end client shoot to see a behind the scenes look at how the video production process really works. These lessons are packed with key filmmaking fundamentals and concepts for the rest of the course material to build on top of.

•    Set up and choose the best way to shoot your specific video

•    Main steps to film a cooler looking and cinematic project

•    Cinematography and composition fundamentals

•    Techniques to maximize your location and time while shooting

•    Creatively use your lenses, surrounding, and camera

2. Get the Most Out of Your Camera Settings

Getting great looking shots first starts with getting your camera set up properly. Here, you'll get crystal clear on how to set your camera's functions, settings, and parameters. These foundational learning lessons will give you the confidence to get out and start shooting.

•   Learn how to effectively use all of the functions and settings on your camera

•   Get the perfect exposure with ISO, shutter speed, and aperture

•   Create a great looking image with white balance and frame rate

•   Use picture profile and focal length for your specific shooting style

•   Utilize your camera's latitude and dynamic range

3. Light and Shoot Your Scenes Like a Pro

Now that you have a rock solid understanding of your camera, here's where we'll use lighting and video production techniques to make your videos shine. These hands-on lessons will give you the tools to create stunning looking images using natural or artificial lighting.

•   Use colored gels, practicals, exposure contrast, your outfit and location choice like a pro 

•   Make yourself look great on-camera with the right lens choice and proper lighting

•   Learn the most essential framing, cinematography, and composition techniques

•   Get that "cinematic filmmaking look" for your own personal video setup

•   2 point, 3 point, rim light, natural light, high key and low key lighting

4. Record Crystal Clear Sounding Audio

You've worked alongside me to massively upgrade and improve all things visual, now it's time to talk audio. In this section, we dive into different microphone types, recording environments, audio hacks, and getting the absolute best sounding audio quality possible.

•   Set your shoot up for crystal clear sounding audio and great sound dynamics

•   Learn how top filmmakers get rid of echoes, buzzing, distortions, pops, and hums

•   DIY set up to get great sounding vocals for your videos or podcasts at home

•   Top audio recording techniques for video creators and filmmakers

•   Audio hacks and which mics to use for different filming situations

5. Create Next Level Vids with B-roll and Cutaway Shots

In this step, you're going to walk away with advanced techniques that experienced video creators use to create exciting and engaging videos. This process will allow you to utilize more advanced film techniques in a way that is fun and easy to use regardless of skill level.

•   Film a more professional looking video using shot types different cinematography techniques

•   Effectively use coverage to set yourself up for success in the editing process

•   Get a filmmaker understanding of the purpose and use of each shot type

•   Create a more dynamic final product with framing and multiple angles

•   How to use the 180 degree rule, rule of thirds, and frame balancing

6. Get That Cinematic Look with Camera Movement

This is one of my favorite parts of the course, creating cinematic shots with camera movement! There's a reason why it's called "motion picture." Here we take a deep dive into how, when, and why to use different movements to create cinematic looking videos.

•   Learn the ideal focal length, movement, frame rate, and composition choices for your project

•   Get incredible looking and feeling shots using top video production techniques

•   Use the same types of camera movement that you see in feature films

•   Learn how movement direction, quality, and speed effect your audience

•   Bring an overall filmmaking look and style to your videos

7. Make Your Shot List and Film Your Epic Montage

Once you learn these shot list techniques, you won't go back to shooting important projects without one (trust me)! In this hands-on section, you're going to envision, outline, and shoot the type of montage that turns an ordinary project into an extraordinary project.

•  Synthesize all the video production techniques learned into your final course video project

•  Step by step guide to knocking out your list of specific shots in the best way possible

•  In-camera transitions, filmmaking tricks, and how to make an impactful ending shot

•  Essentials to create an organized and practical shot list for all future projects

•  Cinematography tips and tricks to make your videos stand out

8. Expert Guest Speakers and Video Production Keys to Success

Here you sit down with me and 3 expert guest speakers that have spent years working as successful full-time filmmakers. These lessons will give you the insights, actionable takeaways, and inspiration that will add some extra creative fuel to the skills you've gained in this course!

•  Bonus tools and ways to continue getting better shots after graduating this course

•  Top pro's and con's of today's most frequently used camera equipment

•  Lens choice, equipment, and tips for properly choosing your video gear

•  How to continue to make the most out of your skillset and equipment

•  Motivation, progress, growth, and success as a video creator

9. Course Bonuses and Progressing Beyond this Course

You've made it! We worked together to build your skillset through each section and then in the last step, we combined the whole process into your very own crystal clear looking and sounding final product. Now it's time for you to go out their and continue to create videos you love!

•  Synthesize, recap, and review all of the lessons learned in the course

•  Integrate the tools and know how to continue to improve and grow

•  Accept my course challenge to start your new series or project

•  Special student bonuses for completing the course

•  And much more


My biggest goal for you:

The goal of this course is to give you all the knowledge and techniques that I've gained from 10+ years in the film industry (working with clients like Red Bull, Taco Bell, and Discovery Channel) in a way that is fun to learn and easy to understand.


Shooting better videos no matter what:

Whether you're shooting Instagram videos, YouTube videos, short films, music videos, documentaries, videos for professional clients, personal projects, on a smartphone or camera... The actionable takeaways from this course will benefit you regardless of your equipment or budget.


You'll have lifetime access to:

•   85 Individual video lessons

•   6 Hours of learning content

•   8 Downloadable resources

•   6 Detailed case studies

•   4 Bonus video lectures

•   3 Course Articles

•   12 Hands-on lessons

•   10 Interactive exercises

•   3 Expert guest speakers

•   40 Gigabytes of streamable content

•   Updates to all future course materials

•   One on one with me in the Q&A section


If you want to learn the tools to shoot videos that you're proud of, this is the course for you.

I'll see you inside!

Julian
targetAudiences: YouTubers, Instagramers, Tik Tokers, Videographers, Aspiring Filmmakers, Online Content Creators, Artists and Photographers

courseDetails.title: Máster en WordPress 2023, ¡Desde Cero Hasta Experto!

Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


El 38% de los sitios web de Internet han sido creados con WordPress. Es una herramienta muy fácil de aprender, en el cual podrás personalizar un sitio web desde cero para cualquier propósito. Ya sea que desee crear un portafolio personal, un blog o un sitio web comercial para vender sus productos y servicios.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos diversas aplicaciones web con WordPress, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, podrá crear aplicaciones web con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

courseDetails.title: The Complete SAP Analytics Cloud Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to create stories, plans, digital boardroom, analytic apps, and make predictions in SAC. Data source included.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Become an SAP Analytic Cloud master by setting up BI, planning, and making prediction through real-world projects

SAP analytics cloud consultant is one of the hottest careers in tech. Have you ever wondered what's the best path for me or what's my first step in building a technical career in SAP business analysis?

I'm going to take you through the process of understanding how to use SAP analytics cloud. Whether you're looking to discover the core BI features or use planning module at work, this course will get you ready to plan and start to use SAP analytics cloud quickly.

In this course, we will dive into the SAP analytics cloud offerings and the level of subscription that each entail. Then we will look at how to use this app to explore and visualize your data from scratch, as well as which smart assist features will work best for your situation.

We will explore the various system admin tools that can be used to manage files and deploy content.

You will learn how to develop custom app in SAP analytics hub and understand the steps to create a new digital boardroom, as well as how to store your reporting and create a solution to ensure that your company’s on premises data is protected in the cloud.

Finally, we’ll focus on planning model including budgets allocation, forecast, what if analysis and a lot more.

courseDetails.title: WooCommerce Theme Development: Advanced Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to customize WooCommerce templates, create demo versions and submit the theme to official WordPress repository
courseDetails.longDescription:
100% Answer Rate! Every single question posted to this class is answered within 24 hours by the instructor.

You can earn a living, or make some cash on the side, as a freelancer or full-time WooCommerce theme developer

Are you looking for a comprehensive WooCommerce theme development course? Have you ever thought about becoming a professional WooCommerce theme developer and make some money on the side?

Today WooCommerce is quickly becoming the next big thing in e-commerce. Its mission is to transform any WordPress website into a real e-commerce store. And it really does! That's why so many developers today want to learn how to create themes for it.

You'll find many WooCommerce tutorials out there, but most of the times they are very confusing.

This course is different. It features almost 100 lessons in which I'll really share with you everything I've learned so far about creating themes, especially about how to build a WordPress theme with WooCommerce compatibility.

Today, many developers make money quickly building themes to people who want a custom theme for their stores. Good freelancers will charge anywhere between $3,000 and $15,000 for a simple custom WordPress website. WordPress sites with WooCommerce capabilities are more profitable to clients, so they are more than willing to pay even more!

Many other developers earn a living selling premium versions of their themes. And you can be one of them too!

I'm an instructor of more than 25,000 satisfied students only here at Udemy and I know how to help you.


What exactly are you going to learn?

Here's a quick list of the main subjects covered by this course. You'll learn:

  • How to create a classic WordPress theme that works perfectly well with Woocommerce (NOTE: in this course, a classic theme will be created, not a block theme);

  • How to declare WooCommerce support and customize your themes. Your clients' online stores will become even more attractive;

  • How to modify the WooCommerce template files in the right way. Your store will look the way you want;

  • How to use the WooCommerce shortcodes the way no one does;

  • How to use powerful tools like Theme Customizer and TGM Plugin Activation to make the store shine;

  • How to create a responsive menu and a sexy and modern slideshow  - without using plugins!

  • How to add a blog to the e-commerce store. Your theme users will sell more!

And more! How about learning how to create demo versions of your theme?

If your intention is to sell premium versions of your theme, you'll see that the ones with demo versions are the top sellers. Your clients will love them!

And how about making them available in any language?

You'll learn how to create themes that are fully translatable. Clients from all over the world will be able to use your themes, as they will be fully compatible with Poedit or any WordPress translation plugin.

And it doesn't end here...

How about making your WooCommerce themes really secure?

You will learn how to put in place, step by step, the main WordPress security features in your theme's code! Just relax! There will be no loopholes for anyone to attack your theme.

And to top it off, start a new career as an official WordPress/WooCommerce theme developer

Follow me as I send the theme created in the course out to the official WordPress theme repository. This is one of the best strategies for those who want to start making money by creating themes, even free ones.

You will understand all the tests that are necessary to pass through the strict review system of WordPress, until the publication of the theme. And, of course, you'll also understand some of the strategies you can use to make money with the theme and make a living as a theme creator. Yes, you can make money, even with free themes hosted at the official WordPress theme repository.

And, on top of that, all the content is loaded with basic notions about creating WordPress themes such as loops, inner pages, sidebars, template parts, filters, action hooks, page templates, enqueuing Bootstrap and Google fonts etc. Really, I won't hide anything in this course!

Besides, you'll have all the material available to follow the lessons.


Who this course is for?

I recommend this course to programmers, IT students, web developers, web designers, or any freelancer or full-time professional who works with PHP, HTML and CSS. It's recommended for everyone who want to build a full-time business, creating custom WooCommerce themes for clients or for selling.

I don't recommend, in any way, for curious people, shop owners, or people who don't know how to write code yet.

This is not a regular WooCommerce course. My goal is to teach the student how to create a theme, so we'll be writing a lot of code. If you are interested in just creating a webstore, without having to understand programming, there are several other courses that can help you out there.

This course is not about setting up a store. We are not going to learn how to configure payment methods, product shipping methods. We are not going to test those extraordinary membership plugins. We are not going to configure subscription plugins, marketing plugins, nothing like that.

This course is aimed at all those who want to become professional theme creators. Basically the course is aimed at two types of people.

  1. Those who would like to become independent, create their own custom theme, learning to customize the look of the store the way they want, or learn to customize third-party themes. They can do it for themselves, or for their clients.

  2. People who have plans to fly even higher!
